title: Project: 'Cyber Runner'
description: An endless runner game built in Unity, featuring procedural level generation and character rigging.

title: Character: 'The Alchemist'
description: A high-poly character model sculpted, textured, and rigged for animation in Blender.

title: App: 'Project Planner'
description: A task management dashboard built with React.js, featuring a modern UI and real-time updates.

title: Cinematic Trailer
description: A short, cinematic trailer edited in Premiere Pro with motion graphics from After Effects.

title: Advanced Character Rig
description: A complex character rig with custom controls and constraints for expressive animation.

title: 'Forest Temple' Scene
description: An environment art piece created in Unreal Engine 5, utilizing Nanite and Lumen.
